parameters.group:
a factor with levels Normal
Physical Disability Mental Disability
parameters.emotion: emotional support provided to the child, a numeric vector
parameters.play: recreational time spent with the child, a numeric vector

title: Father Parenting Competence
description:
Description
The data, from an exercise given by Meyers et al. (2006) relates to 60
fathers assessed on three subscales of a Perceived Parenting Competence
Scale. The fathers were selected from three groups: (a) fathers of a child
with no disabilities; (b) fathers with a physically disabled child; (c)
fathers with a mentally disabled child.
reference: The scores on the response variables are discrete.
usage: A data frame with 60 observations on the following 4 variables.
